rows.label: tev014701_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014701_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Shingo about Lao.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014701_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014701_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Shingo if anything is troubling him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014701_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Shingo about his actions during the enemy attack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014701_MSG0001
rows.name:
Lao can be blunt, but the way he treats me like a
little brother means a lot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014701_MSG0002
rows.name:
Earlier, I asked him a question about using guns,
and he pulled out his weapon and showed me how
to shoot it without saying a word.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014701_MSG0003
rows.name: He's the sort of guy who'd rather show than tell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014701_MSG0004
rows.name:
Lao is the strongest BLADE I know. Maybe the strongest
man I know. I hope to be just like him one day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014701_MSG0010
rows.name: T-troubling me...? W-well...yes...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014701_MSG0013
rows.name:
But it's the sort of problem I have to find a way to
solve myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014701_MSG0014
rows.name: I mean, I guess I can ask Lao for advice, but...yeah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014701_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Shingo about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014701_MSG0031
rows.name:
Lao can be blunt, but the way he treats me like a
little brother means a lot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014701_MSG0032
rows.name:
Earlier, I asked him a question about using guns,
and he pulled out his weapon and showed me how
to shoot it without saying a word.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014701_MSG0033
rows.name: He's the sort of guy who'd rather show than tell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014701_MSG0034
rows.name:
Lao is the strongest BLADE I know. Maybe the strongest
man I know. I hope to be just like him one day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014701_MSG0038
rows.name:
Dorothy and I have been talking about what we want
to do next.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014701_MSG0039
rows.name:
Once we find the Lifehold Core, we want to return to
our real bodies and start a family.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014701_MSG0040
rows.name:
So I told Lao, "Let's drive the Ganglion away already
and find that Lifehold!"[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014701_MSG0041
rows.name:
Lao didn't actually respond, but I think that's because
he didn't need to. He'll answer with deeds, not words.
He's real cool like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014701_MSG0050
rows.name:
Mondo said he regretted leaving the restricted hangar,
but I think it was the right thing to do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014701_MSG0051
rows.name:
I know there was apparently something important in
there, but what's important to me is New LA itself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014701_MSG0052
rows.name:
And if killing even just one enemy would have brought
the people of New LA a step closer to resuming their
peaceful lives, then how can that be wrong?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014701_MSG0053
rows.name:
How to fight when you're low on ammo...
How to repel a surprise attack at night...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014701_MSG0054
rows.name:
I may not have much experience myself, but I have
all the useful knowledge that Lao has given me.[ST:wait ]
